description: Up to 20,000 words to be written on a topic chosen by the student, subject to the approval of the Postgraduate Coordinator in consultation with the intended supervisor. Full-time students commencing in Semester 1 enrol in ANCH6850 for two consecutive semesters (Part A and Part B). Full-time students commencing in Semester 2 enrol in ANCH6860 for two consecutive semesters Part A Sem 2 and Part B in Sem 1 of the following year).
